010package imagingbook.common.interpolation;
011
012import imagingbook.common.image.access.ScalarAccessor;
013
014public class SplineInterpolator implements PixelInterpolator {
015        private final double a; 
016        private final double b;
017
018        
019        public SplineInterpolator(ScalarAccessor ia) {
020                this(0.5, 0.0); // default is a Catmull-Rom spline
021        }
022        
023        public SplineInterpolator(double a, double b) {
024                super();
025                this.a = a;
026                this.b = b;
027        }
028        
029        
030        @Override
031        public float getInterpolatedValue(ScalarAccessor ia, double x, double y) {
032                final int u0 = (int) Math.floor(x);     //use floor to handle negative coordinates too
033                final int v0 = (int) Math.floor(y);
034                double q = 0;
035                for (int j = 0, v = v0 - 1; j <= 3; j++, v++) {
036//                      int v = v0 + j - 1;
037                        double p = 0;
038                        for (int i = 0, u = u0 - 1; i <= 3; i++, u++) {
039//                              int u = u0 + i - 1;
040                                p = p + w_cs(x - u) * ia.getVal(u, v);
041                        }
042                        q = q + w_cs(y - v) * p;
043                }
044                return (float) q;
045        }       
046        
047        private double w_cs(double x) {
048                x = Math.abs(x);
049                double w = 0;
050                if (x < 1) 
051                        w = (-6*a - 9*b + 12) * x*x*x + (6*a + 12*b - 18) * x*x - 2*b + 6;
052                else if (x < 2) 
053                        w = (-6*a - b) * x*x*x + (30*a + 6*b) * x*x + (-48*a - 12*b) * x + 24*a + 8*b;
054                return w/6;
055        }
056
057}
